# plugin(data)

Boostrap template plugin for doxdox.

Parameters

data Array

Methods parsed using a doxdox parser.

Examples

parseInputs(inputs, {'parser': 'dox', 'layout': 'bootstrap'}).then(content => console.log(content));

Returns

Promise

Promise with generated content.
